name: Shopping List
description: Making sure you have enough Mana Orbs.

no-garage-button.name: Garage Button
no-garage-button.description: If you want the Mod button in the Icon Kit (Garage). When disabled, you can only interact with the Info button located in the Shops.

disable-checkmark.name: Remove Checkmark
disable-checkmark.description: Icons aren't greyed out and displayed without checkmark. If you want to see the designs.
